about_the_game:
game:

Play as a curious and relaxed creature gardening and exploring a quiet world. Then grow some goblin spuds and send them in a roguelike dungeon to be trained as soldiers for the big war going on.

A unique mix of chill gardening and intense dungeon running. Spend your time exploring a beautiful world to find rare and exotic materials to craft with, new plants to grow and care for and lots of secrets. Then rush into action in some dark dungeons and try to go as far as you can. All for the glory of the green army!

story:

The great war rages on. It always has and always will. The army of the greenskins is washing over the world. You are not the kind of creature who likes to get their head bashed in and so you found a quiet corner of the Fell to setup in. Your tower, a ruin of an older time is where you keep your trophies, your tools and your very comfortable bed.
But you still help! For a price...
The army constantly needs new heroes and you've got a great little thing going here, growing some young goblins and sending them to the deep dungeons to get trained. Then, if they come back, you can send them to the war to become good little soldiers. But they are always asking for more. Bigger, better and stronger recruits. So you need to upgrade your operation, prepare them better.

features:

  • A beautiful word to explore at your own pace, filled with secrets and exotic landscapes.
  • Dark humour in a ridiculous world.
  • A deep and rewarding crafting and upgrades system.
  • Fishing!
  • Very challenging combat in procedurally generated dungeons.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10

  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: In a beautiful word filled with secrets and exotic landscapes, a very chill creature is growing goblin spores in his garden. Then trains them to be sent off to war. Rogue-like dungeon adventuring meets gardening and exploration. Oh, and fishing!
